quotes.quote: It is the small things in life which count; it is the inconsequential leak which empties the biggest reservoir.
A dwarf on a giant's shoulders sees further of the two.
The spark from a tiny star can ignite the plains.
Notice the small things. The rewards are inversely proportional.
A man isn't tiny or giant enough to defeat anything.
A small unkindness is a great offence.
Never be intimidated by what seems ominous, for big is only an accumulation of many smalls.
The smaller the creature, the bolder its spirit.
A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
Lots of small steps equates to a giant leap.
A tiny step of courage is always a good place to start.
Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
Tiny steps will get you to your goal months and months sooner. A little is better than a lot.
If you cannnot do great things, do small things in a great way.
The smallest task, well done, becomes a miracle of achievement.
If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
No matter how tiny you look, you can lead huge men if you have what the huge men don't have.
Small is the number of people who see with their eyes and think with their minds.
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Small things amuse small minds.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
However big the whale may be, the tiny harpoon can rob him of life.
Do not forget that small daily actions do or undo character.
Big things often have small beginnings.
The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else.
Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
Small is big for the smaller!
A great man is always willing to be little.
Even the largest avalanche is triggered by small things.
Where talent is a dwarf, self-esteem is a giant.
